name: Ice Cream Dash
description:
Be sure to Fullscreen!

Movement:

WASD or Arrow Keys

Escape to Pause

R to Restart

Drift around the country roads in your ice cream truck getting point to point trying to survive. Get to each point to extend your life.

I made all the art, code, sound effects, etc. alone, except for the music

Music asset: "Hyper Casual Music Pack" by VOiD1

The link for it is: https://void1gaming.itch.io/hypercasual-music-pack-1

Sound effects made with https://sfxr.me/

This is my second ever game jam and first time attempting pixel art. I had a lot of fun and enjoyed being a part of this jam. Any and all feedback is appreciated!
